concept.title: Market segments
concept.shortdesc: A market segment is a subset of your customer base, such as New Members or Repeat Buyers. receives the segment data from providers who share this information through IBM Universal Behavior Exchange (UBX).

conbody.p: You can apply one of these market segments to a report to limit the results to paths traveled only by members of the segment. You can also choose to include all customers in your path results, or only customers who do not yet belong to any strategic market segment.
For more information about how segment information is shared with , see the IBM Universal Behavior Exchange (UBX) documentation.
